Events.RelatedDescription: Opened issue "Why replace '+' with space in query param?" (#1760) at vuejs/vue-router
Events.RelatedBody:
### Version
2.7.0

### Reproduction link
[https://github.com/vuejs/vue-router/blob/dev/src/util/query.js#L48](https://github.com/vuejs/vue-router/blob/dev/src/util/query.js#L48)

### Steps to reproduce
http://******/***/?p=xxx yyy

### What is expected?
```
route.query.p => 'xxx yyy'
```

### What is actually happening?
```
route.query.p => 'xxx yyy'
```

---
Does this necessaryï¼Ÿ
src/util/query.js
line: 48
```
var parts = param.replace(/\ /g, ' ').split('=');
```

Events.RelatedDescription: Closed pull request "Add event listeners to router links" (#1759) at vuejs/vue-router
Events.RelatedBody: This PR should add the possibility to add any kind of event listeners to router-links, since they did not support this.
